targets.query:
SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `cluster`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="sys_cpu_utilization_rate"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.223`
FROM metrics_filter("sys_mem_free", '$snapshot', "172.23.96.223:8091", NULL) AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.97`
FROM metrics_filter("sys_mem_free", '$snapshot', "172.23.96.97:8091", NULL) AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.97`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="sysproc_cpu_utilization"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND d.labels.proc="ns_server"
  AND d.labels.instance="172.23.96.97:8091"
  AND time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.223`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="sysproc_cpu_utilization"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND d.labels.proc="ns_server"
  AND d.labels.instance="172.23.96.223:8091"
  AND time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.97`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="sysproc_cpu_utilization"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND d.labels.proc="memcached"
  AND d.labels.instance="172.23.96.97:8091"
  AND time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.223`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.97`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="sysproc_mem_resident"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND d.labels.proc="ns_server"
  AND d.labels.instance="172.23.96.97:8091"

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.223`

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.97`

UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t

  AND d.labels.instance="172.23.96.97:8091"

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `172.23.96.223`
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS mem
FROM metrics_filter("kv_mem_used_bytes", '$snapshot', NULL, "cbmonitor") AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS memory
FROM metrics_filter("kv_memory_used_bytes", '$snapshot', NULL, "cbmonitor") AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS cbmonitor
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ep_meta_data_memory_bytes"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND d.labels.`bucket`="cbmonitor"
  AND time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS metadata
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ep_meta_data_memory_bytes"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')
  AND d.labels.`bucket`="metadata"
  AND time_range(t._t)

UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS cbmonitor

UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS metadata

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS cbmonitor
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ep_diskqueue_fill"
  AND d.labels.`bucket`="cbmonitor"

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS metadata
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ep_diskqueue_fill"

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS cbmonitor

  AND time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS metadata
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ep_diskqueue_drain"
  AND d.labels.`bucket`="metadata"

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS cbmonitor
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ops"
  AND ('$snapshot'='All' OR d.labels.job='$snapshot')

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS metadata
FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d

WHERE d.metric_name="kv_ops"

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS cbmonitor
FROM metrics_filter("kv_vb_ops_get", '$snapshot', NULL, "cbmonitor") AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE time_range(t._t)

UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `cbmonitor-tmp`
FROM metrics_filter("kv_ep_tmp_oom_errors", '$snapshot', NULL, "cbmonitor") AS d
UNNEST _timeseries(d,{"ts_ranges":[${__from},${__to}]}) AS t
WHERE time_range(t._t)

SELECT MILLIS_TO_STR(t._t) AS time, t._v0 AS `metadata-tmp`

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT d.labels.job FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d WHERE d.labels.job IS NOT NULL
list.label: Job
list.name: snapshot
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.labels.job FROM cbmonitor._default._default AS d WHERE d.labels.job IS NOT NULL
